programme.title: Djam
programme.desc: Djam, a bold young Greek woman, travels to Istanbul to look for an engine part for her uncle’s boat. She meets a stranded and penniless Avril, who is a volunteer for Syrian refugees. Together, they embark on a lively, music-filled journey to Mytilene.

programme.title: The Uninvited Guest
programme.desc: In this suspense thriller, Felix, an architect, lets a stranger into his home to use his phone. When the man suddenly disappears inside the house, Felix finds himself in in a cat and mouse chase and his house becomes a maze.

programme.title: The Black Minutes
programme.desc: Vicente Rangel, a musician turned detective, embarks on a police case to catch a murderer of girls in a corrupt oil town on the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (2)
programme.desc: With his colleague’s life on the line, Inspector Mehmet has to bust Thai crime boss Worawit out of jail. But an ambush by the Red Dragon gang leaves Worawit kidnapped and Mehmet injured and semi-conscious. How will Mehmet save his colleague now?

programme.title: Passed by Censor
programme.desc: In an Istanbul prison, Zakir is tasked with reading and censoring the letters inmates receive. Tasked with a writing assignment for his night class, Zakir uses a photograph of an inmate's wife for inspiration, but fantasy soon morphs into delusion.

programme.title: Blizzard of Souls
programme.desc: After losing his mother and his home, Arturs finds some consolation in joining the army. However, war is nothing like he imagined.

programme.title: Sofia
programme.desc: In Morocco, sex outside marriage is punishable by up to 12 months in prison. But when unmarried Sofia gives birth, her family’s biggest fear is not her going to jail, it’s preserving their honour.

programme.title: Rival
programme.desc: 9-year-old Roman follows his mother Oksana, an illegal nurse in Germany. Oksana falls in love with 62-year-old Gert who tries to befriend Roman. While spending an afternoon alone with Roman, Gert suddenly dies of a heart attack, leaving Roman alone.

programme.title: Oddball
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

programme.title: Good Luck Sam
programme.desc: Sam and Stéphane, childhood friends and ski equipment designers, embark on a wild quest to save their struggling business. They hatch a plan to enter Sam into the Winter Olympics, and have him compete under his father’s home country of Algeria.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Decisions In Athens
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet goes on an unofficial assignment abroad to help his ex-wife Sevim to track down her missing partner Steffen, an investigative journalist, and his kidnapped daughter Clara in the Greek capital Athens.

programme.title: What's for Dinner, Mom?
programme.desc: Sisters Tae and Yo return to their childhood home and discover a box of recipes and letters from their late Japanese mother. As Tae uncovers her mother’s hidden struggles, she journeys to Taiwan to retrace her past through memory and food.

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

programme.title: The Golden Dream
programme.desc: Juan, Sara and Samuel, all 15 years old, flee from Guatemala towards the USA. On their journey through Mexico they meet Chauk, a Tzotzil indian who does not speak Spanish and has no official documents. They believe they will find a better world beyond the USA-Mexico border but they run into a harsh reality.
